title: Monta Ellis: 'Basketball was my escape. I really didn’t have a childhood'
text:
Published By: Indy Star - Today 
As a boy growing up in a turbulent world, Ellis found peace on the water. He’s almost 30, and fishing still soothes his soul. �... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
